body: This mostly lgtm and is a good idea. Getting an actual deploy time injected as an env var or file is possible but requires some hoopjumping. If AMI build time would be sufficient, that would be easier (but would also be the same for stage and prod), and also similar to this number. Another option that might be worth exploring is [deployment tracking with New Relic](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/apm/applications-menu/events/deployments-page) which can give a fairly fine-grained log of deployments/revisions/performance.
